original_text: Jacob lived in Egypt seventeen years, and the years of his life were a hundred and forty-seven.
korean_text: 야곱이 애굽 땅에 십칠 년을 거주하였으니 그의 나이가 백사십칠 세라

sentences.original_text: Jacob lived in Egypt seventeen years
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱은 이집트에서 십칠 년 동안 살았습니다

sentences.original_text: and the years of his life were a hundred and forty-seven
